As darkfate circle above, the water continued to surround the energy 
tunnel leading down to the base, the way for Darkfate to enter was 
given. Inside the base Frostbite recieved the com on her computer and 
sent one back to Darkfate.

Frostbite: "Enter via the energy tunnel."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Darkfate::
> 
> Darkfate  flew around InFectron's base area, and opened his 
> commlink"I'm Darkfate, commander of BlackFortress -I'm here to talk 
> with Infectron's leader"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > Above Alliance Island, the impressive form of Vampiza flys. 
Stright 
> > over the Iron fist and the old base of the alliance.  Meanwhile, 
> > Inside the Oblivion of Pherical hologram of the Earth shows 
> Darkfate 
> > approaching the area of the Infecticon ship. Not one to waste 
time 
> > Frostbite taps a green button. A moment the later the ocean 
> beaneath 
> > Darkfate seemingly egins to bulge before it parts off to the side 
> to 
> > show a bright circular energy field hoding the sea from falling 
in 
> on 
> > the ship. On another portion of the ship, two small portions open 
> up 
> > before two odd looking ships seemingly flying like a vertical 
like 
> > exit and fire out into the ocean. Each then flys off towards the 
> > surface before they break through and the bottom folds out into 
> > wings. Each one passenger ship then speeds off towards the 
location 
> > of the IGL transmission.
